byline.contributor: Sameer Yasir contributed reporting from Silikote, Kashmir.

abstract: Residents of village of Mandhole in Pakistani-controlled portion of Kashmir dispute Indian Army claim that it carried out surgical strikes against four militant bases in area.

headline.print_headline: In Kashmir, Pakistan Questions India’s ‘Surgical Strikes’ on Militants
headline.main: In Kashmir, Pakistan Questions India’s ‘Surgical Strikes’ on Militants

snippet: Villagers and military officials on the Pakistani side of the Line of Control rejected India’s claims that it had destroyed militant bases in this disputed region....
lead_paragraph: Villagers and military officials on the Pakistani side of the Line of Control rejected India’s claims that it had destroyed militant bases in this disputed region.
